# LogicalNetworkInterface

Each logical network interface is effectively a network and IP pair.

## Properties

Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**default_gateway** | **bool** | Whether this interface is the default gateway for the instance. Only one interface can be the default gateway for the instance. | [optional] 
**id** | **str** | An identifier for the &#x60;Network&#x60;, generated by the backend. | [optional] 
**ip_address** | **str** | IP address in the network | [optional] 
**network** | **str** | Name of the network | [optional] 
**network_type** | **str** | Type of network. | [optional]
